utils module¶

utils.comp_min_max(expression_data, rounds)¶

Computes the min-max value of a TAI patterns for permuted phylostrata

Parameters:

  • expression_data (pd.DataFrame) – expression data

  • rounds (int) – number of permutations of phylostrata

Returns:

min-max values for the TAI patterns, used to determine the empirical p-value

Return type:

np.array

utils.comp_vars(expression_data, rounds)¶

Computes the min-variances of a TAI patterns for permuted phylostrata

Parameters:

  • expression_data (pd.DataFrame) – expression data

  • rounds (int) – number of permutations of phylostrata

Returns:

variances for the TAI patterns, used to determine the empirical p-value

Return type:

np.array

utils.extract_coexpressed(args)¶

Finds all genes, that are co-expressed with the identified set and saves them in a file

Parameters:

args (argparse.Namespace) – gets args from the main cli script

utils.extract_similar(args)¶

identified genes, that have similar expression patterns to the extracted ones and generates a file that includes those and the genes identified by the minimizer

Parameters:

args (argparse.Namespace) – gets args from the main cli script

Returns:

saves the similar genes and the originally identified genes into a file

Return type:

None

utils.get_extracted_genes(args)¶

extracts genes, that are significantly influencing the TAI pattern

Parameters:

args (argparse.Namespace) – gets args from the main cli script

Returns:

Saves the identified genes, the (best) solution and run summary into files

Return type:

None

utils.get_fastas(args)¶

Makes a fasta file with all the extracted genes

Parameters:

args (argparse.Namespace) – gets args from the main cli script

trapga
